Package src.main.mvc.model.character

Class GhostModel

java.lang.Object
src.main.mvc.model.character.CharacterModel
src.main.mvc.model.character.GhostModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlinkyModel, ClydeModel, InkyModel, PinkyModel
public abstract class GhostModel extends CharacterModel
The GhostModel class represents the abstract model of a ghost character in the game. It extends the CharacterModel class and provides methods to get and set the vulnerability status of the ghost, get the name of the ghost, and move the ghost depending on the Pacman position.
